column4: sjoerd: you can always look for a barebones setup with the mb you want..
I have, all I found was a really exspensive setup with a supermicro motherboard for amd opteron
I haven't been able to choose one yet, because I have no idea which ones fit and which don't :)
I was more like looking for a 19" 1U server case like the one from Supermicro I linked
